alert.note: Alert for Southern Big Horn (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 19 at 11:58PM MST until December 20 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Freezing Drizzle. * WHERE...In Wyoming, Sheridan Foothills. In Montana, Southern Big Horn. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on very slick to treacherous travel conditions tonight through Monday morning. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...All surfaces including roads and sidewalks will become very slick. Be very cautious walking or driving.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at http://www.weather.gov/billings
